Gatekeeper Ziggurat:
Came the voice from the scope:
One day, I was a man just like you. Under the influence of a powerful spell my body disappeared, and my soul was trapped in this very place.
For several hundred years, I have worked here for a gatekeeper.
Almost all of my memory erased, so I do not know what kind of person I was. The only thing I remember is what I have to open the gates of the Master Seals.
